name: Rebrain Platform
content: Mechanism for connecting highly skilled workers abroad with businesses operating in Greece. Each user can be registered as Scientists / Experts / Researchers (S.E.R) or as business and have the respectively permissions and features. Implemented with CPT's of WordPress, ACF. It contains interactivity with ESCO's API.

name: Support Greek Music
content: Crowdfunding platform to aid and practically bind the creators’ copyright, during a deafeningly resonant period, caused by COVID-19 pandemic. My contribution in that project was the frontend development.

name: Ampelokipi - Menemeni
content: A multilanguage portal for Ampelokipi - Menemeni Municipality. The citizen can apply online for problems or questions, connected with TaxisNet or simple login. Implementation of custom search functionality with AJAX filters to improve user's experience.

name: HEDNO (ΔΕΔΔΗΕ) Chatbot
content: Hellenic Electricity Distribution Network Operator's chatbot landing page.

name: Crowdpolicy events
content: Crowdpolicy's events with AJAX filtering with pagination. Built with WordPress' CPT, ACF.

name: Web app for Image Similarity using Siamese Neural Network
content: My thesis was to implement a Siamese Neural Network using the VGG19 model, pre-trained on ImageNet to calculate the match of a query image through a dataset of images. To find the similarity, I used a contrastive loss function and a Euclidean distance. You will find my implementation on a web app for this purpose on the below link of Github.

name: Todo App
content: Classic Todo app developed on React(CRA) as a practice project. You can add, edit and delete a task, as well as, to mark it as completed with one click.
